title: Opinion of the European Economic and Social Committee on 'Proposal for a Regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council on preventing the dissemination of terrorist content online' - A contribution from the European Commission to the Leaders' meeting in Salzburg on 19-20 September 2018 (COM(2018) 640 final - 2018-0331 (COD))

Commission Recommendation (EU) 2018/334 of 1 March 2018 on measures to effectively tackle illegal content online
